sustainability: What is the wished sustainability? [low, mid, high]
last_crop: Which was the last used crop in the field? [soy, sunflower, oats, wheat, sorghum, corn, barley]
rain_regime: What is the rain regime like? [low, mid, high]
month: In which month will the crop be sown?
investment: Which is the level of available capital to invest? [low, mid, high]
exploitation: Which type of exploitation is planned? [cattle, agriculture, mixed]
